name: @eduvault/core
description: Backend api server, the main app, and the homepage

scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:api
scripts.build:start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start:production: sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose-prod.yml down --remove-orphans && sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose-prod.yml up -d
scripts.start:production:logs: sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose-prod.yml down --remove-orphans && sudo docker-compose -f docker-compose-prod.yml up
scripts.inst: npm install && npm run inst:api && npm run inst:app
scripts.inst:ci: npm ci --production && cd ./api && npm ci && cd ../app && npm ci
scripts.clean: rm -rf app/build; rm -rf api/dist;  rm app/package-lock.json; rm api/package-lock.json; rm -rf app/node_modules; rm -rf api/node_modules; rm -rf node_modules; rm package-lock.json
